* Desmonus's body seemed stiff to her as well as weak, and it had remained 
so for quite some time. But, at least before she was able to move, not she 
found that she couldn't.
Her eyes flittered open to mere slits but she had to blink, the light of the 
neon lights overhead a bit too bright for her. Her bat senses reeling.
Slag! What she would give for the warm caress of the dark.
Desmonus tried to bring her hand up to her face to shield her sensitive 
optics with her hand but it wouldn't move, wondering if it was just her 
weakness that was causing this.
But something also felt strange, something just didn't seem right.
It was almost as if she had more programming in place of the bit that she 
had lost in the crash to this strange place, it was there but not quite 
finished.
With a weak sigh she closed her eyes to shield them from the light, so 
confused at what was going on.*
